name: Red Shooter
description:
Welcome to a challenging arcade shooter! Destroy all the enemies to win!

Features:
* Excellent 2D navigation mechanics!
* Ranks to encourage replayability! Can yaou get a S-rank?
* Fantastic health regeneration mechanics! Stand still to recover health!
* One extremely difficult level! No checkpoints! 
* Fantastic shooting mechanics!
* Fancy and intuitive user interface mechanics!

Control Overview:
Use the WASD keys to move. Press the left and right arrow keys to rotate. Press X to shoot. Press the Escape key to go back to the Main Menu. Stand still to recover health. 

Objective: Kill all the enemies without being killed.

Credits:

Game Made By:
D-Studios

Created With Unity
